channel.title: Standard Students Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Pranoy & Ben
channel.itunes:subtitle: Two Highschoolers talk about Highschool.
channel.itunes:summary: Standard Students is a low-budget podcast made by two highschoolers who discuss their weekly-ish lives.

item.title: Standard Students 1: We don't like to introduce ourselves
item.dc:creator: Standard Students
item.description:
Episode 1: We don't like Introductions

After months of troubleshooting, two idiots finally manage to cobble together a product that they call "Standard Students"
